Sentencas: NiO-YSZ composites and Ni-YSZ cermets were successfully performed for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs

Sentencas: These composites must have enough porosity and appropriate microstructure for transferring the fuel gases.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs

Sentencas: In this study, ball-milling was used as a simple, cost-effective method for the purpose of mixing the raw materials.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs

Sentencas: The homogeneity of NiO-YSZ composites was examined by Map mode of SEM.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs

Sentencas: NiO-YSZ composites were reduced at the high temperature under the controlled atmosphere to fabricate Ni-YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs

Sentencas: Variations in the anode phases were investigated by XRD and microstructure and porosity of composites were observed by SEM.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs

Sentencas: Effective parameters like temperatures and the amount of pore former were investigated on open porosity, bulk density, electrical conductivity as well as electrochemical impedance of NiO-YSZ composites and Ni-YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs

Sentencas: A thin layer of YSZ was deposited by EPD as an electrolyte on NiO-YSZ composites which had various amount of open porosity, to study its effect on the performance of semi-cells by electrochemical impedance.
Titulo: Investigation on microstructures of NiO-YSZ composite and Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs
